summary: Black® Sexy Underwear HD-2K, best viewed with [URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes BBE NeverNude mod [/URL]. Replaces the ugly vanilla underwear for females.
descriptionHtml:
[B]Hello @ all,[/B]
[IMG]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/5842-1-1326209130.png[/IMG]
[B][COLOR=Red][SIZE=5]Black® Sexy Underwear HD 2K[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

is a textur HD-replacer at 2048x2048 made for myself and my coming mod Black® Sexy Housecarls. As i have problems to making underwear shown under Nocturnal-Dress with alpha-blending, i post first this as a standalone.

Best viewed with [B]Calientes  [/B]excellent [URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]BBE NeverNude mod [/URL], but this is not included and not required. All pictures are made with this mod enabled.

[B][SIZE=3]Install:[/SIZE][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Unzip-file at your preferred location,
[*]copy whole \"Data\"-folder in your Skyrim-folder,
[*]answer overwrite-question of windows with \"yes\",
[*]if you want another colour than black (shame on you) just overwrite it with other color
[*]finish, start Skyrim.[/LIST] 

[B][SIZE=3]Uninstall:[/SIZE][/B]
[LIST]
[*]delete the two files starting with\"[B][I]femaleunderwear[/I][/B]\" from \"[B][I]Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Actors\\Character\\Female[/I][/B]\"-folder,[/LIST] 

[SIZE=\"3\"][B]Conflicts:[/B] [/SIZE]
This mod will not work with any nude-mods, but it works fine with Calientes NeverNude mod or other Body-replacers, if they dont paint underwear at \"femalybody.dds\"

[B]If you like this mode, please vote/endorse for me.[/B]
 
[SIZE=4][B][COLOR=red][I]Take a look at my other mods:[/I][/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[LIST][*][SIZE=4][B][URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6351]Black® Sexy Catsuit[/URL][/B][/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4][B][URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3774]18 Black® Katanas[/URL][/B][/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4][B][URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3878]Black® lightened Alchemy ML (E/G/S/F/I/R/PL/CZ)[/URL][/B][/SIZE][/LIST]

[SIZE=4][B][COLOR=red][I]Coming soon:[/I][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[LIST][*][SIZE=4]Black® Sexy Housecarls[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Black® Nightingale - fully craftable, improvable[/B][/SIZE]
[/LIST]
[SIZE=3][B]Change-Log:[/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][B]1.02 [/B][/SIZE]
[LIST][*]White version added[/LIST]
[LIST][*]Color versions separated for easier install[/LIST]
[SIZE=3][B]1.01 [/B][/SIZE]
[LIST][*]Red version added[/LIST]
[SIZE=3][B]1.00 [/B][/SIZE]
[LIST][*]Initilal Release[/LIST]

[SIZE=3][B]Credits:[/B][/SIZE]
 This mod was made with following utilities: 
 [URL=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]SnifScope[/URL] from [URL=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/]SnifTools[/URL]
[URL=http://www.adobe.com/de/products/photoshop.html]Photoshop CS5[/URL] with 
[URL=http://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-texture-tools-adobe-photoshop]NVidia DDS-Plug-In[/URL].
Many thanks to Caliente for his great work making this mod looking much better (altghough not necessary for this replacer).


[SIZE=4][B]© 2012 - Black® Widowmaker - Software Unlimited®[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#696969][SIZE=1][B][FONT=Arial Black]Black[/FONT][/B]® is not a color - its a-way-of-life-trademark of [B]Black[/B]®[B] Widowmaker - Software Unlimited[/B]® [/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=1][COLOR=#696969]Even my humor is [B][FONT=Arial Black]Black[/FONT][/B]®![/COLOR][/SIZE]
author: Black Widowmaker - Software Unlimited
